subject: Order
description_text:
Hello, I just noticed that my package landed in France in Marigane, and now
it's in China...? Is this normal? I live in France

conversations.body_text: Hi martin mcfly,  Could you please provide the order number? I’ll help you check it.

Order #SSN4882

 And for UPS

1ZJ455510435485521

Le sam. 20 déc. 2025, 13:59, service@simsonn.com

So?

Le sam. 20 déc. 2025, 14:55, martin mcfly <renderscyril@gmail.com> a écrit :

> Order #SSN4882
>
>  And for UPS
>
> 1ZJ455510435485521
>
> Le sam. 20 déc. 2025, 13:59, service@simsonn.com
Hi，Martin McFly，  ​The package was Delivered at PERPIGNAN, FR on 12/22/2025. Di you get it? You can track it via https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST/trackdetails
